Html:
Hi, 

I am looking for object recognition library which will let me to recognize some objects on photos even if the photos were made from different point of view, weather conditions, lighting. 

Is Touchless SDK can do such tasks or it use less advanced algorithmes?

Thanks in advance,

Vadim Sherman
This would be out of the scope of Touchless SDK. Touchless was designed to recognize and use markers to manipulate applications data. It's a Human Machine Interface (HMI) tool.
